metadata.title: Tarevity - Streamline Your Productivity with Smart Task Management
metadata.description: Transform how you organize daily work with Tarevity's intuitive task management.

structuredData.description: A modern task management application that helps professionals organize their work and increase productivity.

hero.title: Manage your tasks efficiently
hero.description: Organize your tasks, set priorities, and never forget important deadlines again. A simple and efficient way to increase your productivity.

features.heading: Features
features.subheading: Everything you need to stay organized

feature1.title: Simple task management
feature1.description: Add, edit, and mark tasks as completed with ease. Intuitive and user-friendly interface.

feature2.title: Never miss a deadline
feature2.description: Set due dates for your tasks and stay in control of your commitments.

feature3.title: Secure and private
feature3.description: Your tasks are stored securely. Login with GitHub and Google for greater convenience.

feature4.title: Access from anywhere
feature4.description: Responsive design that works on all devices. Your tasks are always within reach.

cta.description: Sign up for free and try all features of Tarevity.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
commitment.description: At Tarevity, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our task management application. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: While using our application, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: We may also collect information on how the application is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as your device's IP address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our application that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use the collected data for various purposes:

items.provide: To provide and maintain our service
items.notify: To notify you about changes to our service
items.analysis: To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our service
items.monitor: To monitor the usage of the service
items.technical: To detect, prevent and address technical issues

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our application and store certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device.
cookies.description2: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our application.

session.title: Session Cookies:
session.description: We use Session Cookies to operate our service.

preference.title: Preference Cookies:
preference.description: We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.

security.title: Security Cookies:
security.description: We use Security Cookies for security purposes.

security.title: Data Security
security.description1: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

items.breach: Password breach checking via HIBP API

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Authentication Providers
thirdParty.description1: Our application allows you to sign in using third-party authentication providers, such as Google and GitHub. When you choose to sign in using one of these services, we may collect personal information that your privacy settings on that service permit us to access.
thirdParty.description2: We only use this information for authentication purposes and to create your user profile within our application. We do not share this information with additional third parties without your consent.

rights.title: Your Data Rights
rights.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as:

items.access: The right to access personal information we hold about you
items.correction: The right to request correction of inaccurate data
items.deletion: The right to request deletion of your data

rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.description2: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
